DarkAngel:

"I wanna mean..."said DarkAngel"That this menace will destroy us 
all... we haven't other choice than join us... I can't tell you 
who's it 'cause Tylrael forbide me it... it you desire ask him, 
contact him... If you can, 'cause he had blocked our ways to 
comunicate.. so you have an idea about the power of him... and the 
need to joind together Predacons, Tripedocus and Maximals, after all 
ended we can continue our fight"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus: What do you mean by our survival? What threat could be so 
> dire?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > DarkAngel::
> > 
> > "Our suvivor... Our, I wanna mean all factions involded in this 
> new 
> > BeastWars have a common menace comming if we don't join our 
> power... 
> > all will be destroyed"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Rodimus: I will, Denzabar. But for now, let me speak in 
private 
> > with
> > > this "ambassador". Come, Tripred, this way.
> > > 
> > > He goes in a closed room and waits for Darkangel.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus: This must be dire indeed for Tyrael to send you. What 
> > brings you?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > > > "Let me know when it is ok to play with Elita," Denzabar said
> > > solemnly, " And 
> > > > Rodimus, sir, we must chat ewhhen you have a minute."
